'''Lumenstone Ore''' is an item that can be obtained in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]]. It is used to upgrade the [[Lumenstone Adjuvant]].

==How to Obtain==
# [[Chasm Spelunkers]] Quest Reward.
# On ground in [[Stony Halls]] after completing [[The Heavenly Stone's Debris]].<gallery hideaddbutton="true" captionalign="center">
Item Lumenstone Ore 2 Location.png|Second Location
Item Lumenstone Ore 2 Context.png|Second Context
</gallery>
# On ground after using [[Key to a Stony Hall]] during [[Wherefore Did the Spiritstone Descend?]].<gallery hideaddbutton="true" captionalign="center">
Item Lumenstone Ore 3 Location.png|Third Location
Item Lumenstone Ore 3 Context.png|Third Context
</gallery>

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Complete [[The Heavenly Stone's Debris]] and approach second Lumenstone Ore)
:'''Paimon:''' Ooh, look, there's some shining ore here as well!
;(Pick up second Lumenstone Ore)
:'''Paimon:''' Is this raw ore, just like the one like [[Zhiqiong]] found earlier?
----
;(Use [[Key to a Stony Hall]] during [[Wherefore Did the Spiritstone Descend?]] and approach third Lumenstone Ore)
:'''Paimon:''' Huh, that crystal looks familiar. Let's have a look, shall we?
;(Pick up third Lumenstone Ore)
:'''Paimon:''' Ooh, it's raw Lumenstone ore! That's what Jinwu and Zhiqiong called it, right?
{{Dialogue end}}
